mapper.select: SELECT b.BOOKID AS BOOKID, b.NAME AS BOOKNAME, c.CHAPTERID, c.CHAPTERNAME, b.LASTSERIALTIME AS LASTSERIALTIME FROM CON_T_BOOK_AUTHOR a INNER JOIN CON_T_BASEBOOK b ON a.BOOKID = b.BOOKID INNER JOIN CON_T_BASECHAPTER c ON b.BOOKID = c.BOOKID WHERE ( b.ISFINISH = '0' OR b.ISFINISH IS NULL ) AND b.STATUS = '13' AND b.LASTSERIALTIME >= STR_TO_DATE( #{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND a.AUTHORID = #{authorId} ORDER BY b.LASTSERIALTIME DESC
